original_text: And every base had four brasen wheels, and plates of brass: and the four corners thereof had undersetters: under the laver were undersetters molten, at the side of every addition.
korean_text: 그 받침 수레에 각각 네 놋바퀴와 놋축이 있고 받침 수레 네 발 밑에는 어깨 같은 것이 있으며 그 어깨 같은 것은 물두멍 아래쪽에 부어 만들었고 화환은 각각 그 옆에 있으며

sentences.original_text: And every base had four brasen wheels
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각 받침에는 놋쇠 바퀴 네 개가 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and the four corners thereof had undersetters
under the laver were undersetters molten
sentences.korean_translation: 물통 아래에는 녹여 만든 받침대가 있었고

sentences.original_text: at the side of every addition
